item.title: Scraping Game Reviews Websites with Scrapy and Selenium
item.description: Project Description Videogames are among my favorite hobbies. I usually buy a couple of games every month so that I always have something to play in my spare time. This means I need to spend some time every day reading games reviews and articles in order to to keep myself up to date. Sure this is a good way of taking my mind off work, but lately I am getting a bit tired of it.
